answers.answer: I had the high blood pressure thing like it would be 145 then drop to 120 then the next day 165 then drop to 130 I think it all depends on what you eat and how much in take... Because if the midwife says that you don't have it pike mine said then the next thing I thought about was what I was eating... But everything should be fine I know it was for me... I have a healthy baby boy who is 11 days old now.. Good luck mama

It's not just my bp I've been seeing stars a lot just randomly even when I'm not active my diets pretty good tbh and light headed Ness is terrible and shooting pains in my head all signs of preeclampsia but bloods indicate my kidneys function is fine

Thats great that you dont have it! This is my second pregnancy with preeclamplsia and its really hard. It sounds like your dr has ruled out gestational hypertension as well if your bp isn't steadily increasing or consistently in the high range. Had your dr talked to you about what can cause your bp to 'spike'? Such as stress, pain, overdoing it etc. Wishing you and baby all the best.
If your kidney function is normal you could just have pregnancy induced hypertension.

Tbh my midwife fobs me off a little she just said that it could be the bp machine as it goes to normal on second attempt she don't seem to help much and never answers her fone so half the time I'm left in the dark
Are you on BP meds?  If so, sounds like you may need dosage adjustment. How many weeks are you?
Mine was like that too. All my ob said was to watch my salt intake and exercise more.

question: So I was having symptoms for preeclampsia 2 weeks ago midwife sent off my bloods and said I haven't got it  but my symptoms have increased just minus the protein in my urine and blood pressures go high but then after few minutes go to normal anyone else had this
title: preeclampsia? ?
